title: Vieira sermon and mixing of cultures in Americas

content.question: The sermon delivered by Vieira is best seen as evidence for which of the following?

choices.label: The development of new religions in the Americas
The mixing of African and European cultures in the Americas
The impact of European colonization on the native population of the Americas
The intensification of traditional peasant labor in the plantation system

content.answer: The mixing of African and European cultures in the Americas

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
